staffthoughts.WorkerEmptyTrashcan: I wish I could be a zookeeper.
staffthoughts.WaitingForTaskBench: I work too hard. I need a rest.
staffthoughts.WaitingForTaskCenter: I need to resupply at the staff center.
staffthoughts.EducatorGotoEducateGuests: I can't wait to teach the guests.
staffthoughts.KeeperGoFillDish: The animals need to be fed.
staffthoughts.KeeperFillDish: I hope the animals like this food.
staffthoughts.KeeperRakePoo: It's a dirty job but someone has to do it.
staffthoughts.KeeperGoHealAnimal: A sick animal needs my help!
staffthoughts.KeeperHealAnimal: Thankfully I treated the sick animal in time.
staffthoughts.KeeperGoCrateAnimal: An animal has attacked a guest!
staffthoughts.KeeperCrateAnimal: The animal is now in a crate and everyone is safe.
staffthoughts.KeeperCheckupBaby: I love caring for the baby animals
